name: Name: WP e-Commerce Table Price Shortcode
author: MyWebsiteAdvisor

sections.description:
This plugin adds a shortcode for use with the WordPress e-Commerce Plugin.
Use the [wpsc_table_price] shortcode where you want to display the table rate prices for a product.
This plugin can save you time and energy when you update your table prices.

Developer Website: http://MyWebsiteAdvisor.com/

Plugin Support: http://MyWebsiteAdvisor.com/support/

Plugin Page: http://MyWebsiteAdvisor.com/tools/wordpress-plugins/wp-e-commerce-table-price-shortcode/

Premium Version with Advanced Features including:

  • Customize Shortcode Output
  • Automatically Detect Product ID when used on Product Page
  • Can be Automatically Embedded at the End of Product Description
  • Lifetime Priority Support and Updates!

Learn More Here: http://MyWebsiteAdvisor.com/tools/wordpress-plugins/wp-e-commerce-table-price-shortcode/

Requirements:

  • WordPress
  • WP e-Commerce Plugin

To-do:
sections.installation:
1. Upload plugin to the /wp-content/plugins/ directory.
  2. Activate the plugin through the ‘Plugins’ menu in WordPress.
  3. use the [wpsc_table_price] shortcode where you want to display the table prices for a product

Developer Website: http://MyWebsiteAdvisor.com/

Plugin Support: http://MyWebsiteAdvisor.com/support/
